home.role: IT Project Manager & IT Business Analyst
home.description: I started as a Frontend Developer, and now I apply my strategic skills in project management and business analysis to make a difference in new projects.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am Gulxanƒ±m ∆èkb…ôrova ‚Äî understanding user needs, analyzing business processes, and shaping product strategy are my core strengths.
about.description2: My goal is to identify customer needs, build product strategy, and efficiently manage communication between business and technical teams. With my technical experience, I am capable of translating business requirements into real technological solutions.
about.techSkills: Technical skills: Jira, Power BI, React.js, Firebase.

items.description: I will develop professional knowledge in the field of business analytics during this period.
items.longDescription: In this program, I will focus on business process modeling, data analysis, and visualization. By the end of the program, I will acquire skills in SQL, Excel, and Business Intelligence (BI) tools.

items.description: I gained experience in modern web technologies, component-based approaches, and interface design.
items.longDescription: In this course, I acquired deep knowledge in modern frontend technologies, React and other JS libraries, component-based design, and user interface creation. I built real-world applications through practical projects.

items.description: I developed my core mathematics knowledge during this period.
items.longDescription: During this period, I improved my understanding of fundamental mathematical principles, analytical and logical thinking skills. I gained experience in mathematical modeling and problem solving.

projects.title: Ministry of Health Digital Health Center
projects.description: Managing projects, coordinating with contractors and government agencies, preparing technical documents, and compiling monthly reports.
projects.detailedDescription: In this project, I organize team responsibilities, plan and monitor project phases. By establishing effective communication with contractors and government agencies, I ensure the project is completed on time and within budget. Additionally, I am responsible for preparing technical documentation, managing risks, and presenting monthly reports.

projects.title: Datricon Technologies
projects.description: Implementation and automation of CRM systems, business process optimization, data analysis with SQL and Power BI.
projects.detailedDescription: In this project, I built CRM systems from scratch, automated and optimized business processes. I performed data analysis using SQL and Power BI, creating visual reports for informed decision-making. Delivered customized solutions tailored to client requirements and ensured the project was completed on time and with high quality.

projects.title: Alas Academy - Digital Horizons Scholarship Program
projects.description: Teaching the fundamentals of Python, supporting students with practical exercises, and conducting interactive lessons.
projects.detailedDescription: In this project, I taught students the fundamentals of Python programming, developed their skills through practical exercises, and conducted interactive lessons. I assisted students in solving problems and ensured the program achieved its learning objectives.

projects.title: Polygraf.ai
projects.description: Development of web applications with React and Next.js, UI/UX-driven interface optimization, and API integration.
projects.detailedDescription: In this project, I developed high-performance web applications using React and Next.js. I optimized interfaces based on user experience, ensured seamless API integration, and oversaw the project to be completed on time and with high quality.

projects.title: Yelload Advertising Agency
projects.description: Development of web solutions tailored to client requirements, creation of admin panels and dashboards, interface optimization, and testing.
projects.detailedDescription: In this project, I developed high-quality web solutions tailored to client needs, created admin panels and dashboards. I optimized interfaces according to UI/UX design and tested application functionality, ensuring the project was completed on time and with high quality.

projects.title: 4you - Online Psychology Service
projects.description: Defining product development strategy, coordinating with the technical team, releasing new features, and analyzing user feedback.
projects.detailedDescription: In this project, I defined the product development strategy, led the technical team, and ensured timely release of new features. I analyzed user feedback to implement product improvements and oversaw the successful execution of the project.
